body: Main tasks and responsibilities: - University degree is a must; - Minimum 1 year experience in IT audit;- CISA certification represents a plus; - Very good command of English;- Proactive attitude and excellent communication skills;- Ability to make tough decisions;- Integrity and capacity to act independently;- High level of motivation and clear intent to develop a career in audit;- Proficiency in using Microsoft Office applicationsJob requirements:- Performs audits in IT, head office departments and subsidiaries; - Performs fraud investigations when necessary;- Understands the company processes and participates in the methodologies maintenance and improvement activities;- Performs tests in accordance with internal audit methodology;- Collects information and analyses collected data;- Applies complex audit procedures, identifies errors, their impact and determines actions to be taken for their correction;- Reviews working documents and prepares audit reports related to audit mission progress;- Participates to development / improvement of internal procedures, documents and information flow;- Discusses exceptions and findings with relevant departments;- Identifies weaknesses in internal controls and makes recommendations for improvements.”Only selected candidates will be contacted.
title: IT Auditor
locations: Fabrica de Glucoza 5 Sect2, București, Municipiul București, România
